body:
Hey, Everyone!
So Christmas is approaching upon us and wondering if you guys have any ideas for Community Channel content for this festive season.
Leave your suggestions below!
body_tagged:
Hey, Everyone!
So Christmas is approaching upon us and wondering if you guys have any ideas for Community Channel content for this festive season.
Leave your suggestions below!
title: Community Channel Christmas Content!

replies.body: Special events, maybe? Some kind of collaboration between the Avicus youtubers would be cool as well.
replies.body_tagged: Special events, maybe? Some kind of collaboration between the Avicus youtubers would be cool as well.

replies.body: I was thinking of getting a TS Room and hosting a "christmas party," where we just talk and stuff. Maybe you can record it and make a compilation of weird / funny moments?
replies.body_tagged: I was thinking of getting a TS Room and hosting a "christmas party," where we just talk and stuff. Maybe you can record it and make a compilation of weird / funny moments?
